name: NSUserNotification.ActivationType
desc: These constants describe how the user notification was activated.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The user did not interact with the notification alert.

items.name: case contentsClicked
items.desc: The user clicked on the contents of the notification alert.

items.name: case actionButtonClicked
items.desc: The user clicked on the action button of the notification alert.

items.name: case replied
items.desc: The user replied to the notification.

items.name: case additionalActionClicked
items.desc: The user clicked on the additional action button of the notification alert.
